text:
Franklin J. "Frank" Biondi, Jr. (January 9, 1945 – November 25, 2019) was an American businessman and entertainment executive. He held leadership roles at Viacom, Universal Studios, and HBO.
Early life.
Biondi was born Franklin J. Biondi, Jr. in New York City, New York on January 9, 1945.
Death.
On November 25, 2019, Biondi died of bladder cancer in Los Angeles at the age of 74.
